text: Greycliff Prairie Dog Town State Park is a Montana state park located on the eastern edge of the community of Greycliff. The park protects and preserves the black-tailed prairie dog. Prairie dogs in the park ==References== ==External links== *Greycliff Prairie Dog Town State Park Montana Fish, Wildlife & Parks *Greycliff Prairie Dog Town State Park Map Montana Fish, Wildlife & Parks Category:State parks of Montana Category:Protected areas of Sweet Grass County, Montana Category:Protected areas established in 1974
title: Greycliff Prairie Dog Town State Park
